Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel and Near to Station Visited the ABC Hotel during the easter break. Its a nice and a small hotel. I guess it just has 9 - 10 rooms. The rooms are very comfortable and nice. We had used the Quadrapule room. It had one king size bed and 2 single beds. The bathroom was clean and room also had a fridge and tv. It was cheap for 100 Euros per night.Its a nice place to stay to see florence. Nice coffee shops and pizza joints nearby.The only problem is that the hotel is on the 3rd floor and there is no lift so if you are carying lot of luggage it can be a pain. The staff is very helpful and kind. It was overall a great experience I will definitely stay there again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
